concept.title: Configuring Authentication by the Cache Server
concept.shortdesc: When the cache server receives client credentials during the handshake operation, the server authenticates the client with the callback configured in the security-client-authenticator system property. The handshake succeeds or fails depending on the results of the authentication process.
